message: I feel like on a smaller scale than Twitter and Foursquare, urdb.org kind of broke out last year at SXSW, so I'd like to hear their perspective one year later.
@ericflo Thanks! We'll do our best to get that for you :) Will you be attending SXSW?

@ericflo Great! If you're not too busy Saturday evening, I'd like to invite you to join me (the day after I'm back from Afghanistan) for the BetaCandy & StartupList SXSW Kick Off event. Naval Ravikant and Wayne Sutton will also be there... Please see >> http://plancast.com/p/4c6l Thanks for your support :)
